title: Reinforcement Learning-Based Control System Optimization: Introduction to Adaptive Dynamic Programming (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary calculus, linear algebra, and Python programming experience
context.additional_context: Practical sessions conducted using learners' personal devices, with acquisition of reinforcement learning techniques applicable to real-world engineering problems.

learning_goals: Can explain the fundamental principles of reinforcement learning and its application cases in optimizing control systems
Can implement value function iteration algorithms using an adaptive dynamic programming framework
Can apply accelerated learning design to improve convergence speed in a ball-beam balancing system simulation and analyze the results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
